title: spack numpy distutils compilers
body:
I don't recall if we ever tried to address this issue, but if I attempt to build something like scipy on top of a spack python with numpy, it tries to bring in the spack compilers:

$ /usr/apps/python3.5.1/bin/python3 setup.py -v build

...

compiling C sources
C compiler: /collab/usr/gapps/python/build/spack-python-3.5.1/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc -pthread -Wsign-compare -Wunreachable-code -DNDEBUG -g -fwrapv -O3 -Wall -Wstrict-prototypes -fPIC

compile options: '-I/usr/apps/python3.5.1/lib/python3.5/site-packages/numpy/core/include -I/usr/apps/python3.5.1/lib/python3.5/site-packages/numpy/core/include -I/usr/apps/python3.5.1/include/python3.5m -c'
gcc: scipy/cluster/_hierarchy.c
